summary: This document is an index of materials produced by the law firm BSF in response to a grand jury subpoena in the civil case against Ghislaine Maxwell. It lists pleadings, orders, discovery productions, and numerous deposition transcripts and exhibits from 2016-2017, revealing the extensive scope of discovery in the case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the civil case (15 Civ. 7433) and the subject of the grand jury subpoena. Her depositions from April and July 2016 are listed.

connections.description: Both are central figures in the case, with Maxwell being the defendant and Epstein a key associate who was deposed.
Alessi, a staff member, was deposed, indicating he likely worked at properties associated with Maxwell and Epstein.
Dershowitz, a lawyer, provided designated testimony relevant to the case.

events.title: Sealed Order for Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: A sealed order was issued in relation to the grand jury subpoena (19 Misc. 149).

events.title: Sealed Conference Hearing
events.description: A sealed conference hearing was held before Judge Sweet.

keyFacts: The document is an index of materials produced in response to a grand jury subpoena in the civil case against Ghislaine Maxwell (15 Civ. 7433).
It reveals an extensive discovery process including depositions of key figures (Maxwell, Epstein), staff (Alessi), experts, and numerous other witnesses from 2016-2017.
Multiple names of deponents are redacted in the listing, indicated by blank entries following 'Deposition of'.
The index includes materials from non-parties such as 'CASSELL', 'MAR-A-LAGO', and 'VICTIMS_REFUSE_SILENCE'.
The materials were loaded to a ShareFile system in April 2019 in response to the sealed grand jury subpoena order dated April 9, 2019.
